name: Froggy Driver
description:
Hi all!  

This is Game #2 of a Game-A-Day self isolation challenge.
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the entirety of the UK is in self-isolation lockdown.
During this time, I have challenged myself to produce a small game each day.

This game sees you controlling a little frog car driving around a sandbox track in an attempt to collect each of the gems. Once again the colours are offensive to the eyeballs, and I'm thinking this is going to be a theme haha :)
